user.title: AIL: Aziende Industriali di Lugano
user.description: Enter your credentials for AIL EnergyBuddy. You can find your account details at [{login_url}]({login_url}). If you don't have an account, you can create one at [{account_create_url}]({account_create_url}).

tariff.title: Energy Tariff Configuration
tariff.description: Configure your electricity tariff settings. If you enable fixed tariff, you'll need to enter your peak (day) and off-peak (night) rates in CHF/kWh. Default values are set according to AIL standard rates.
